name.ja: <ruby>羊<rt>よう</rt></ruby><ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby>とメェ～<ruby>界<rt>かい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>逆<rt>ぎゃく</rt></ruby><ruby>転<rt>てん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card(s) while you have 15 or more Beast Type monsters in your Graveyard, send your entire hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Shuffle all cards from the Graveyards into the owner's Decks. Then, you can draw 1 card and show it. If that card is a Level 7 or higher Beast Type monster, you can Special Summon it face-up to your field.
